title: Avaline Saddlebags
description:
A Gripping and Grisly Read…When the butchered and multilated remains of two local women are discovered, DI Dylan Monroe and his team find themselves up to their necks in a brutal murder investigation.As the body count rapidly rises—each slaying more savage than the last, it soon becomes clear the victims have one thing in common—they are all male to female transexuals.In a race against time, Dylan is forced to go undercover in the only place that links the victims—Dorothy’s, a well-known drag and cabaret bar in the heart of Liverpool.
Avaline Saddlebags is a gripping, often amusing, psychological thriller with an astonishing twist that will take your breath away... Change can be DEADLY!
author: Netta Newbound
